channel.title: When I click on runserver, I get this
channel.description:
Ok, so when I click on runserver it comes up with this...
[code]Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:311) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:27)[/code]
Does anyone know how to fix this? Because it won't even let me on any of my accounts.

item.title: When I click on runserver, I get this
item.dc:creator: @IcyPimp IcyPimp
item.description:
@IcyPimp wrote:

Open itemhandler.java.

Type in ctrl+g.

Enter 311.

Fix the problem.

See, even though you post noob tuts, we can still be friends. Sept I don’t wanna be your friend.

Read full topic
